textBeforeTable: Order up a tall one in the True Blood Green Foil Burnout T-Shirt, you never know if youll make it out of that place alive. As the only bar in Bon Temps youre bound to attract all types, both the fanged and the furry. The soft black tee features Merlottes Bar & Grill in a deep green foil screen-print while the burnout makes it perfect for layering. Pair it with some Sookie inspired shorts for the ultimate Merlottes look. Made Of: 65% Polyester, 35% Cotton Made In: Imported Gender: Women's Fit: Slim Fit. We recommend buying 1-2 sizes up.
